data.name: FaaSr-Backend
data.description: Production-grade serverless middleware framework enabling DAG-based workflow orchestration across 5+ cloud platforms (AWS Lambda, GCP, GitHub Actions, OpenWhisk, SLURM). Features JWT authentication, fault-tolerant RPC architecture, and automated CI/CD pipelines.

data.name: BugLocalization_BugSleuth
data.description: Unsupervised bug localization technique using genetic programming achieving real-time debugging with millisecond runtime. Localizes 56% of bugs in top-5 ranked suspicious statements from 704 real-world projects, surpassing state-of-the-art methods.

data.name: TicketBookingSystem
data.description: Console-based train booking system demonstrating enterprise-grade software engineering practices. Features BCrypt authentication, clean architecture with service layers, intelligent search algorithms, and atomic transaction management with JSON persistence.

data.name: stock-tracker-agent
data.description: Real-time stock monitoring system with AI-driven market analysis and automated SMS notifications. Features multi-agent architecture using OpenAI's Agents SDK, 24/7 background scheduling, and conversational SMS commands via Twilio integration.

data.name: multithreaded-http-server
data.description: Production-ready multi-threaded HTTP/1.1 server in Java featuring thread pools, RESTful APIs, real-time monitoring, and modern web interface. Demonstrates enterprise-grade concurrent programming.

data.name: FaaSr-Docker
data.description: Docker containerization infrastructure for FaaSr serverless framework supporting 5+ cloud platforms. Automated CI/CD pipelines build base images (Python, R, Rocker) and platform-specific containers for AWS Lambda, GCP, GitHub Actions, OpenWhisk, and SLURM with multi-registry deployment.
